title: Computer-Based Dental Morphology Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic anatomical terminology and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended education for pre-service/in-service teachers conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify morphological features of major teeth with 80% accuracy using a 3D modeling app.
Learners can reproduce tooth structures with 70% accuracy after three practice sessions using digital drawing tools.
Learners can analyze at least three error patterns related to dental morphology through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
